resources.string:
This app will make donation simple and easy
You can donate all things like Blood, Organs, Food and Clothes etc in 1 platform.
You can easily donate what he wants.You doesn’t need to come physically he can donate from home.
Donation will be given in correct and safe hands. Through the organizations donor’s donation will be given to the needy people.

Donation app is to help the people as per their need by donating organs, blood, food, clothes etc. so that people can easily find their needs. And one who wants to donate anything like food,
blood, clothes etc. they can donate using this platform. This app manages all information about the donor and the charitable trusts. Anyone can use this app very easily.

string.name: help
string.b:
Enter username and Password.If you are admin then login as admin using specific email and password \n
If you have not registered then register yourself and then login. \n
Chosse one option of what donation you want to donate. \n
Fill the form and click on submit button to submit the details of donation. \n
Data can be visible to Admin only after entering specific mail id and password.
